Description:
Detect successful authentications from countries you do not operate out of.

Author: MikeDuddington, '@dudders1'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Successful Authentications From Countries You Do Not Operate Out Of
Query: sourcetype='azure-signinlogs' eql select * from _source_ where (status = 'success' and  not location like '%<countries you do operate out of e,g gb, use or for multiple>%')
